Thoughts on the LemonPeelFacial.com Logo

We had some thoughts of the new LemonPeelFacial.com logo

11 December 2015

Back in April we introduced the new logo we created for Michelle Wright at LemonPeelFacial.com

We thought we would expand on that article by posting some more images of the logo that portray it in context.

You can see more mockups of the logo in our Lemon Peel Facial Album on Facebook - Facebook.com/studio.n.creations
